actions.name: Sand Rush
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Dusty Weather. The user is considered Steel Type for the effects of Dusty Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Dusty Weather. The user is considered Steel Type for the effects of Dusty Weather.
